page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: A rural landscape dominates the area with dairy farming most popular with the addition of sheep and early pototoes. Fodder crops including dredge corn (oats & barley) hay and silage were in evidence.Irrigation methods could be seen on large farm.Many small isolated farmhouses and cottages;some new and renovated buildings.St.Stephen village has old and new houses and two inns in the centre near to the church. Modern council houses and new schools on the outskirts of the village. Coombe village much smaller ,quiet and hidden in trees.Some smallholdings marshland afforestation and sewage farm.
